context.name: FAB Defense Self Healing Target With Spare Board (Blue)
context.excerpt: The FAB Defense Self-Healing Static Target is the perfect solution for both indoor and outdoor ranges, it is used for both rifle and handgun practice, law enforcement, military and recreational training.
context.content:
The FAB Defense Self-Healing Target is the perfect solution for both indoor and outdoor ranges, it is used for rifle and handgun practice, law enforcement, military and recreational training.

Suitable for use with any type of handgun or SMG ammunition, The Static Target contains no metal parts, eliminating ricochets and safe even at point blank range.

The RTS Target parts are all made from unique high-grade polymers ensuring shooter safety.

 

 

FAB Defense Self Healing Target Advantages:

Safe for use in all ranges, including point-blank target practice
Durable polymer recovers thousands of hits, no ricochets
Lightweight, easy to setup, transport and store
Perfect for sniper, handgun, and assault rifle training
Compatible friend / foe figure dressings available

 

Static Target With Spare Board Included in the kit:

1 Complete static target kit
1 Replacement self-healing target board
